com.joliciel.talismane.corpus

Interface AnnotatedCorpusReader

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    LanguageDetectorAnnotatedCorpusReader, ParserAnnotatedCorpusReader, PosTagAnnotatedCorpusReader, SentenceDetectorAnnotatedCorpusReader, TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAnnotatedCorpusReader, ParserRegexBasedCorpusReader, PosTagRegexBasedCorpusReader, SentencePerLineCorpusReader, StandoffReader, TextPerLineCorpusReader, TokenPerLineCorpusReader, TokenRegexBasedCorpusReader

    public interface AnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading from an annotated corpus.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getCharacteristics()
      Characteristics describing this corpus reader.
      int getCrossValidationSize()
      The number of cross-validation segments for this corpus.
      int getExcludeIndex()
      Which index to exclude when reading (for training), from 0 to getCrossValidationSize-1.
      int getIncludeIndex()
      Which index to include when reading (for evaluation), from 0 to getCrossValidationSize-1.
      int getMaxSentenceCount()
      If 0, all sentences will be read - otherwise will only read a certain number of sentences.
      int getStartSentence()
      The index of the first sentence to process.
      boolean hasNextSentence()
      Is there another sentence to be read?

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxSentenceCount

        int getMaxSentenceCount()
        If 0, all sentences will be read - otherwise will only read a certain number of sentences.

      • getStartSentence

        int getStartSentence()
        The index of the first sentence to process.

      • getCrossValidationSize

        int getCrossValidationSize()
        The number of cross-validation segments for this corpus. -1 means no cross-validation.

      • getExcludeIndex

        int getExcludeIndex()
        Which index to exclude when reading (for training), from 0 to getCrossValidationSize-1.

      • getIncludeIndex

        int getIncludeIndex()
        Which index to include when reading (for evaluation), from 0 to getCrossValidationSize-1.

      • getCharacteristics

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getCharacteristics()
        Characteristics describing this corpus reader.

      • hasNextSentence

        boolean hasNextSentence()
                 throws TalismaneException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Is there another sentence to be read?
        Throws:
        TalismaneException - if it's impossible to process the next sentence
        java.io.IOException
